text: This is a list of moths of the family Crambidae that are found in South Africa. It also acts as an index to the species articles and forms part of the full List of moths of South Africa. *Achyra coelatalis (Walker, 1859) *Achyra nudalis (Hübner, 1796) *Adelpherupa typicosta
